name: English Name
aboutUs: ALBARGASY has been established as an Egyptian automotive company. Our business aiming to provide & surprise the customer with the highest levels of services.
scope_of_work: ALBARGASY co. conducts automotive (3S) facility sales and marketing as well as TOYOTA authorize dealer since 1984 is one of the biggest authorize dealer, and recently it has become a SKODA (3S) facility authorize dealer, also be an authorized dealer for FORD and mega show room sales all brands.
address: AlBargasy Building, Sheikh Zaied entrance 3 waslet Dahshor, beside Total station.
contact_us_msg: Don't hesitate to ask us something, Our customer support team always ready to help you, they will support you 24/7.
NEWSLETTER_SUBSCRIBE_MSG: Subscribe now and receive weekly newsletter with Latest News and interesting activities.
slogan: Our Slogan says we are providing all the integrated services in place under one name Peace of mind, and here we are working as one team to serve our customers the best possible way.
totyota_slide: Supply all related services & maintenance for TOYOTA; we provide the best quality to our customers at an affordable price and sustainability. We aim to reduce Time, cost and continually looking for new ways to increase performance, qualities and integrated services.
skoda_slide: We supplying all kind of SKODA Genuine Spare Parts through our branches also can be connected to our customers from door to door inside Cairo Free of charge, outside will be handled according the case. For special orders for any spare parts not in our store can be delivered within 72HRS.
ford_slide: Show ROOM, Authorized dealer FORD and Mega show room sales all brands.
slider_header3: Best maintenance at the lowest prices
mission: Our Roadmap starts with our mission, which is our steadfast commitment and purpose as a company. It serves as the standard against which we weigh our actions and decisions.
vision: Our vision serves as the framework for our roadmap and guides every aspect of our business by describing what we need to accomplish in order to continue achieving sustainable, quality growth.
purpose_title: ALBARGASY has been established as an Egyptian automotive company. Our business aiming to provide & surprise the customer with the highest levels of services.
purpose: And Our purpose is To be a leader in Auto sales and after sales services by providing enhanced services, relationship and profitability.
service1: Selling cars through banks by our company
service2: Selling cars in installments directly with the company
service3: Open a current account for withdrawals parts
service_sucess_msg: Your Request received successfully one of our customer services will contact you
